file_content.text: You--you are leaving? But--ah, safe travels.
The Cloister of Meditation is not far.
Outsider. My master saw your coming. He awaits in the Cloister of Meditation.
There's someone else I need to find. Another outsider woman. Seen her?
He's not who I'm here for.
There's someone else I need to find. Another outsider, a woman. Seen her?
He's not who I'm here for.
My master knows of whom you speak.
Who do I have to thank for the warm welcome?
Your master have a name?
Dokath-Ra, the elder.
Thought you were the healers, not the prophets.
What do you mean "he saw me"?
What? You are... this is a misconception. A Mystic is a Mystic.
You will see him.
Yeah, I'll see him.
If you insist.
He's been waiting this long, he can wait a couple more minutes.
I'll see him when I'm ready.
As you will.
You going to make me?
Is that a fact?
He saw you come, you will come.
The Cloister of Meditation is near, but secluded. Follow the silence.
Welcome, pilgrims.
